summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing support for legislation aimed at protecting the country and its people. The email emphasizes confidentiality and attorney-client privilege, indicating its sensitive nature.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing legislative support.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are in communication regarding legislative matters, indicating a relationship beyond mere acquaintance.

keyFacts: The email emphasizes confidentiality and may contain attorney-client privileged information.
Epstein expresses support for legislation that protects the country and its people.
The email was sent on January 21, 2010.
